version_description:
Our users love the extensive Options Greeks, Implied Volatility, Put-Call Parity, etc calculated in Real-Time for each options strike in the last release. Now you are going to love more about the various built-in strategy templates in this release, making Options Pro even more powerful! Building strategies like covered call, call spread, put spread, butterfly spread, calendar spread, diagonal spread, straddle, strangle, collar, iron condor, etc are done within seconds! So simple, so easy, and so enjoyable that you feel like playing your favorite game!
1. Adds Built-in Covered Call Strategy
2. Adds Built-in Bull Call Spread
3. Adds Built-in Bear Call Spread
4. Adds Built-in Bull Put Spread
5. Adds Built-in Bear Put Spread
6. Adds Built-in Calendar Spread
7. Adds Built-in Diagonal Spread
8. Adds Built-in Butterfly Spread
9. Adds Built-in Protective Collar Spread
10. Adds Built-in (Iron) Condor Spread
11. Adds Built-in Straddle Strategy
12. Adds Built-in Strangle Strategy
13. Easily duplicate a strategy with one tap, convenient for investors to make adjustments to a strategy they are monitoring and compare the two without having to rebuild the strategy all over again.
14. Continues to improve user interface

If you like our effort making this app better, please don’t forget to give us a thumb up in the App Store and follow us on Facebook and Twitter. It really means a lot to us.:) Thank you!
https://www.facebook.com/optionspro
https://twitter.com/minteractapp

So simple, so easy, and so enjoyable that you feel like playing your favorite game!

https://twitter.com/minteractapp

Powerful Unusual Options Volume Monitor and Unusual OI (Open Interest) Scanner are here!
. Our subscribers now enjoy live scanning and screening of thousands of significant Unusual Options Activities with detailed Strike, Expiration, Contract, Open Interest, Delta, Today's Volume, Average Daily Volume, Abnormality, and more.
. Scan and screen according to the expiration date, options type, volume abnormality, and underling equity you select.
. Sudden surge in Options Volume or big change in Open Interest could give valuable insight of the real market move under the surface.
. Add “Unlink Strategy Tempalte” feature. Users could further customize an options strategy initially built using the strategy templates.
. Continue to improve user interface.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don’t forget to give us a thumb up in the App Store and follow us on Facebook and Twitter. It really means a lot to us.:) Thank you!
https://www.facebook.com/optionspro
https://twitter.com/minteractapp

. Our subscribers now enjoy live scanning and screening of thousands of significant Unusual Options Activities with detailed Strike, Expiration, Contract, Open Interest, Delta, Today's Volume, Average Daily Volume, Abnormality, and more.
. Scan and screen according to the expiration date, options type, volume abnormality, and underling equity you select.
. Sudden surge in Options Volume or big change in Open Interest could give valuable insight of the real market move under the surface.
. Add “Unlink Strategy Tempalte” feature. Users could further customize an options strategy initially built using the strategy templates.
. Continue to improve user interface.

. Adds Dark and Green color themes to Advanced Stock Chart.
. Able to customize the text size of the coordinates on the Advanced Stock Chart.
. Able to set the space between the bars on Advanced Chart and the chart borders.
. Minor bug fixing.

. Adds Dark and Green color themes to Advanced Stock Chart.
. Able to customize the text size of the coordinates on the Advanced Stock Chart.
. Able to set the space between the bars on Advanced Chart and the chart borders.
. Minor bug fixing.

Recently we've added Live Scan of Unusual Options Activities, Options Greeks & IV calculated in Real-Time for Every strike, powerful Portfolio with options tracking and options strategies. Now Live Scan of Big Money Options is here!

Subscribers can scan and screen Big Money Options activities for both the market and for a particular stock. Savvy investors pay great attention to options activities with big total money. They usually give a valuable insight of the real market move under the surface. Our proprietary Big Money Options Monitor continuously scans the market and identifies the significant options activities with total money exceed USD 100K. Check the detailed trade time, options contract, expiration date, strike, price, volume, total money, and so on. You could further arrange the search according to the options type, trade time, and total money.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don’t forget to give us a thumb up on the App Store and follow us on Facebook and Twitter. It really means a lot to us.:) Thank you!
https://www.facebook.com/optionspro
https://twitter.com/minteractapp

∙ Powerful Options Alert, Stock Price Alert, and Portfolio Alert are here! OptionsPro provides the most comprehensive alerts, including Options Price Alert, Stock Price alert, Portfolio Alert based on portfolio's value, Alert Notification of News, Options Expiration, Earnings, Dividend, Portfolio Summary, Top Mover, SEC filings, Insider Trading, and more.
- Easily create alert for various options contracts, stocks, and portfolios within seconds.
- Receive alert notifications on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod.
- Modify and check the status of alerts at any time.

∙ Enhances Big Money Options scanning.
∙ Improves portfolio performance.

Hope you enjoy. :) If you like our effort making this app better, please don't forget to give us a thump up on the App Store and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for more. Thank you.
https://www.facebook.com/optionspro
https://twitter.com/minteractapp

. Enables Tradier Brokerage support. Users could trade options and stocks directly in the app using their Tradier accounts.
. Improves user interface.

. Enables Tradier Brokerage support. Users could trade options and stocks directly in the app using their Tradier accounts.
. Improves user interface.

Powerful Options Price Chart is here! Advanced Plan subscriber can enjoy
- Price chart for every options contract
- Multiple chart type, date range, and chart period
- Choose from multiple color themes
- Customize the size of coordinates and chart border space

We also enhanced Tradier Brokerage support. Users could trade options and stocks directly in the app using their Tradier accounts.

Hope you enjoy. Thank you.

Powerful Options Price Chart is here! Advanced Plan subscriber can enjoy
- Price chart for every options contract
- Multiple chart type, date range, and chart period
- Choose from multiple color themes
- Customize the size of coordinates and chart border space

We also enhanced Tradier Brokerage support. Users could trade options and stocks directly in the app using their Tradier accounts.

Hope you enjoy. Thank you.

Historical Options Volume, OI, and Max Pain charts are here!
. Subscribers can view Options Volume, OI, and Max Pain charts of both the current trading day and the previous trading day. (Advanced Plan)
. View historical options visualization of all available expiration dates. (Advanced Plan)
. Easily import holding positions (options, stock, etc) from your Tradier Brokerage account to your portfolios. Super fast and convenient, plus great options support.
. Continue to improve performance and user interface.

Historical Options Volume, OI, and Max Pain charts are here!
. Subscribers can view Options Volume, OI, and Max Pain charts of both the current trading day and the previous trading day. (Advanced Plan)
. View historical options visualization of all available expiration dates. (Advanced Plan)
. Easily import holding positions (options, stock, etc) from your Tradier Brokerage account to your portfolios. Super fast and convenient, plus great options support.
. Continue to improve performance and user interface.

New Features -

. Top Implied Volatility Scanner (subscribe)
- Scan and monitor many top IV changes (increase or decrease).
- View the current IV, IV change, and IV change %.
- Scan according to the specific IV type and sort the scanning result.

. Intraday Implied Volatility Chart (subscribe)
- Implied Volatility is a key element in options investing and trading.
- Used to be hard to access, and we start to provide a set of tools.
- TickWatcher Implied Volatility Index checking and Performance improvement.
- Intraday Volatility Chart
- View current IV values and the IV Chart at the same time.

New Features -

. Top Implied Volatility Scanner (subscribe)
- Scan and monitor many top IV changes (increase or decrease).
- View the current IV, IV change, and IV change %.
- Scan according to the specific IV type and sort the scanning result.

. Intraday Implied Volatility Chart (subscribe)
- Implied Volatility is a key element in options investing and trading.
- Used to be hard to access, and we start to provide a set of tools.
- TickWatcher Implied Volatility Index checking and Performance improvement.
- Intraday Volatility Chart
- View current IV values and the IV Chart at the same time.

1. Easily read tweets of individual stocks.
2. Improve portfolio importing from brokerage account.

1. Easily read tweets of individual stocks.
2. Improve portfolio importing from brokerage account.
. Add Unusual Options OI Scanner for the whole market (subscribe).
. Add Unusual Options OI Scanner for the whole market (subscribe).

. Enhance Twitter replying. Easily reply tweets, post new tweets, check trending, and more.
. Quickly search and change keywords when viewing tweets of stocks.
. Support to import portfolios from Robinhood.

. Enhance Twitter replying. Easily reply tweets, post new tweets, check trending, and more.
. Quickly search and change keywords when viewing tweets of stocks.
. Support to import portfolios from Robinhood.

Happy 2017! We are actively improving our app with new features.
+++ Portfolio +++
1. Easily import portfolio from your brokers with Touch ID.
2. Enhance Portfolio Performance Chart. View performance history of 2 weeks.
3. Able to print and email PDF snapshots of all your portfolios or individual portfolio.

+++ Market +++
4. Add in-app Trader’s Web Browser. Keep watching the market quotes while surfing the web. Start browsing with your customized homepage and personalized market bar.
5. Add a shortcut to customize the settings of Market Bar in Trader's Twitter and Trader's Web Browser. Simply swipe left on the Market Bar and the settings button will appear. Customize your Market Bar with your selected stocks or the market index. You can also customize in “More” tab -> “Settings”.

+++ Stocks +++
6. View stock quotes in up to 4 decimal places in Watchlist and "Research" view. Great for penny stocks and bonds.
7. Better layout for OHLC quotes in Watchlist and Research.

+++ Stock Chart +++
8. Multi Chart view has an alternative layout with 2 charts in a row. Quick to view and compare more charts. You can easily switch between 1 chart or 2 charts per row.

+++ General Improvement +++
9. Support 3D touch interaction. Apply varying levels of pressure to the app icon and quickly access your portfolio, options strategy, Home, etc.
10. You can choose to remember login when signing in your Options Pro account.
11. Add YouTube Channel link in "More" tab.

If you like our effort making this app better, please don't forget to give us a thumb up on the App Store and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for more. Thank you.
https://www.facebook.com/optionspro
https://twitter.com/minteractapp

We are actively developing our app with new features. Hope you like them.:)
1. Optimize quotes in the watchlist.
2. Open Options Chain for free use.
3. Open all options strategy templates for free use in Options Strategy Chart.
4. Add Intelligent Stock Ratings under "Research". (for subscribers)
5. Add advanced Options Flow Grid. Identify options trade buy / sell flow, filter by trade size, and help to identify the smart money move. (Pro Plan feature)
6. Improve support message chat.
7. Multi Chart view has an alternative layout with 2 charts in a row. Quick to view and compare more charts. You can easily switch between 1 chart or 2 charts per row.
8. Choose to remember login when signing in your Watchlist account.
9. Fix company name mismatch in Watchlist.
10. Overall improvement.

8. Choose to remember login when signing in your Watchlist account.
9. Fix company name mismatch in Watchlist.
10. Overall improvement.

We are actively working on our app and more exciting features about options are coming.
. Support annotation on options volume, open interest, and max pain chart.
. Improve news.
. Fix an issue of saving options chart.
. Overall improvement.

We are actively working on our app and more exciting features about options are coming.
. Support annotation on options volume, open interest, and max pain chart.
. Improve news.
. Fix an issue of saving options chart.
. Overall improvement.

We are actively developing our apps and bringing you new features and enhancements.
1. Add Historical Daily IV Chart (pro subscriber). In addition to the Top IV Scanner, Intraday IV Chart and IV values, now you can check the historical IV chart for up to 60 days.
2. Add IV for each options expiration date in Options Chain. (for subscribers)
3. Support cryptocurrency in Portfolio and Watchlist, including BTC (Bitcoin), ETH (Ethereum) and LTC (Litecoin).
4. Add BTC (Bitcoin) historical daily chart.
5. Add weekly support in Advanced Stock Chart (default is daily).
6. Add more customized settings for intelligent alerts in Portfolio. You could choose to turn on / off certain types of push notifications ("Me" tab -> "Settings" -> "Notifications").
7. Add "Account Verification" in "Account". Please don't forget to verify your account email to make full use of the features in the app.
8. Overall improvement.

We are actively developing our apps and bringing you new features and enhancements.
1. Add Historical Daily IV Chart (pro subscriber). In addition to the Top IV Scanner, Intraday IV Chart and IV values, now you can check the historical IV chart for up to 60 days.
2. Add IV for each options expiration date in Options Chain. (for subscribers)
3. Support cryptocurrency in Portfolio and Watchlist, including BTC (Bitcoin), ETH (Ethereum) and LTC (Litecoin).
4. Add BTC (Bitcoin) historical daily chart.

6. Add more customized settings for intelligent alerts in Portfolio. You could choose to turn on / off certain types of push notifications ("Me" tab -> "Settings" -> "Notifications").
7. Add "Account Verification" in "Account". Please don't forget to verify your account email to make full use of the features in the app.
8. Overall improvement.

. Pro Plan subscribers can view more data (2-calendar-day data) for Options flow grid with the context of detailed options trade
. Improve stock chart and news.
. Optimize for iPhone X and iOS 11.
. Overall improvement.

. Pro Plan subscribers can view more data (2-calendar-day data) for Options flow grid with the context of detailed options trade
. Improve stock chart and news.
. Optimize for iPhone X and iOS 11.
. Overall improvement.

. Improve annotation on options chart and advanced stock chart.
. Check options flow grid data of the last 7 calendar days. (Pro Plus subscriber)
. Support nearly 2,000 cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ripple, Ethereum, etc.
. Easily track cryptocurrencies in both Watchlist and Portfolio.
. More exciting features are on the way...

. Improve annotation on options chart and advanced stock chart.
. Check options flow grid data of the last 7 calendar days. (Pro Plus subscriber)
. Support nearly 2,000 cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ripple, Ethereum, etc.
. Easily track cryptocurrencies in both Watchlist and Portfolio.
. More exciting features are on the way...

We are very excited to bring you the Augmented Reality (AR) feature in financial data visualization. Now you can visualize Options Volume chart, Options OI chart, and My Watchlist with AR.
1. The screen of your iPhone is no longer the limit; view a lot more data than before.
2. Check the options data in a more detailed way. You can place multiple options charts at multiple places on your desk or floor, and walk around the charts, study the charts from 360-degree angle, and get all details.
3. View 3D options charts of multiple expiration dates. Compare, see the change, see the move, get the trend, you name it.
4. Obtain a natural control and natural user experience. You can easily add and place unlimited number of options charts anywhere, on the desk, floor, sofa, countertop, car hood, and many more. It's fun, useful, and convenient.

Enjoy the amazing Augmented Reality experiences with our specially designed options visualization. Hope you like them! :)

We are very excited to bring you the Augmented Reality (AR) feature in financial data visualization. Now you can visualize Options Volume chart, Options OI chart, and My Watchlist with AR.
1. The screen of your iPhone is no longer the limit; view a lot more data than before.
2. Check the options data in a more detailed way. You can place multiple options charts at multiple places on your desk or floor, and walk around the charts, study the charts from 360-degree angle, and get all details.
3. View 3D options charts of multiple expiration dates. Compare, see the change, see the move, get the trend, you name it.
4. Obtain a natural control and natural user experience. You can easily add and place unlimited number of options charts anywhere, on the desk, floor, sofa, countertop, car hood, and many more. It's fun, useful, and convenient.

Enjoy the amazing Augmented Reality experiences with our specially designed options visualization. Hope you like them! :)

1. Remove banner ads for now.
2. Enhance options flow grid with more customizable settings. Maximum threshold is increased from 10,000 to 30,000.
3. Add Options Money Flow Alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional. (subscription)
4. Add Options Power Indicator. It indicates options' energy in a certain time frame and reveals the underlying buy / sell power of options activities. Green color means positive power (bullish signal) and red color means negative power (bearish signal). (subscription)
5. Add "FA Score" for stocks. We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market. (subscription)
6. Add "TA Score" for stocks. Our smart system automatically performs a technical analysis everyday and generates a diagnostic report based on many indicators. You can check the overall TA strength of a stock, plus breakdown scores of different categories. (subscription)
7. Now you can set your stock notes as public or private notes, so you could share the wisdom. Add "Note Board"; able to share notes.
8. Add stock and cryptocurrency heat maps with Augmented Reality (AR). Furthermore, you can view the information of individual stock or coin / token in the heat map with a tap. Add more controls and Gold / Silver style.
9. Read stock news together with stock price charts in Augmented Reality (AR).
10. Able to save the layout for various charts and displays with Augmented Reality. Next time when you enter AR, easily restore from your saved layout with one tap. Stock market with AR has never been this easy and fast!
11. Able to record AR video directly in the app.
12. Able to export live photo of AR directly in the app.

Latest Updates:
1. Easily view TA Scores (technical analysis score) of multiple stocks in your watch-list with one tap. Our smart system automatically performs technical analysis and generates a diagnostic report based on many indicators. (subscription)
2. Quickly compare FA Scores (fundamental analysis score) of multiple stocks in a watch-list. Know the strength of your stocks compared in the overall market. (subscription)
3. Tap on an individual stock in the comparison view, and get further details of TA / FA Score of the stock.
4. Improve Message Board and Notes; post public notes directly in "Message Board".
5. Enhance portfolio with enhanced options and stock holding positions.
6. Easy to add additional stock purchase to an existing position. The app will calculate the average cost price and the total number of shares for you.
7. Improve "Dividend Distribution" for a portfolio holding position. 
8. Enhance "Close Position" in a portfolio.

Recent Updates:
. Add Options Money Flow Alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional.
. Add Options Power Indicator. It indicates options' energy in a certain time frame and reveals the underlying buy / sell power of options activities.
. Enhance options flow grid with more customizable settings.

. Add Options Money Flow Alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional.

1. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc. (pro / pro plus plan)
2. Add $500K call and put options money flow alert, both directional or non-directional. (pro / pro plus plan)
3. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Home" tab.
4. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis score of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. (pro / pro plus plan)
5. Add "Top Stocks of TA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top technical analysis scores of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. Tap each stock to see more details. (pro / pro plus plan)
6. Improve the speed and overall performance.

1. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc. (pro / pro plus plan)
2. Add $500K call and put options money flow alert, both directional or non-directional. (pro / pro plus plan)
3. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Home" tab.
4. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis score of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. (pro / pro plus plan)
5. Add "Top Stocks of TA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top technical analysis scores of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. Tap each stock to see more details. (pro / pro plus plan)
6. Improve the speed and overall performance.

Latest Updates:
1. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.
2. The app remembers the threshold value you set for each underlying symbol in Options Flow Grid. Easier for you to customize your scanning and filtering of options activities.
3. Continue to improve the speed and overall performance.
4. Continue to optimize for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR and iOS 12.

Recent Updates:
. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc.
. Add $500K call and put options money flow alert, both directional or non-directional.
. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Home" tab.
. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis score of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX.
. Add "Top Stocks of TA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top technical analysis scores of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. Tap each stock to see more details.

Latest Updates:
1. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.
2. The app remembers the threshold value you set for each underlying symbol in Options Flow Grid. Easier for you to customize your scanning and filtering of options activities.
3. Continue to improve the speed and overall performance.
4. Continue to optimize for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR and iOS 12.

Recent Updates:
. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc.
. Add $500K call and put options money flow alert, both directional or non-directional.
. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Home" tab.
. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis score of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX.
. Add "Top Stocks of TA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top technical analysis scores of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. Tap each stock to see more details.

1. Improve options chain.
2. Personalize options chain and select specific call / put strikes you'd like to view. Unselected strikes won't show in the options chain any more. You can manage the settings any time and stay focused on what you are interested in. This feature is especially useful for underlying assets with large amount of strikes like AAPL, SPY, etc.
3. Add multiple options contracts to watchlist at one time. (advanced plan)
4. Add historical scan of Unusual OI (market). You could go to a scanner and tap the date selection button on the top right corner. View scanning results of up to 14 calendar days. (pro plus / pro plan)
5. Enhance "FA Score". Besides the score, you can also check the values of several FA indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc. Know the good and the bad of the indicators.
6. Add interactive sector chart of portfolio. Enter a portfolio, tap the summary view or the action button on the top right corner and choose "Sector Chart". Quickly view the sector composition of a portfolio. Great for rebalancing and equity
sector allocation.
7. View the recent performance chart of each portfolio for up to 1 month. More chart style is added.
8. Continue to enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab.
9. Easier to exit full-screen stock chart mode for iPhone XS, XS Max, and XR.
10. Overall improvement.

1. Improve options chain.
2. Personalize options chain and select specific call / put strikes you'd like to view. Unselected strikes won't show in the options chain any more. You can manage the settings any time and stay focused on what you are interested in. This feature is especially useful for underlying assets with large amount of strikes like AAPL, SPY, etc.
3. Add multiple options contracts to watchlist at one time. (advanced plan)
4. Add historical scan of Unusual OI (market). You could go to a scanner and tap the date selection button on the top right corner. View scanning results of up to 14 calendar days. (pro plus / pro plan)
5. Enhance "FA Score". Besides the score, you can also check the values of several FA indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc. Know the good and the bad of the indicators.

10. Overall improvement.

Latest Updates:
. Able to prevent your device from auto-locking while using the app. ("Me" tab --> "Settings")
. Overall improvement.

Recent Updates:
. Added "Options Flow Stream" in "Home" tab --> "Options Money Flow". You could view the latest buy and sell flow of options trades with details, filter large-sized trades at different levels, and identify how smart money moves.
. Added "FA History Chart" in "Research". View stocks' historical charts of many fundamental analysis indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc.
. Enhanced FA Scores with rich information and charts.
. Added Top Stocks of FA Scores by Industry ("Home" tab --> "Top Stocks of FA Score"). Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis scores of various industries, like computers, banking, apparel, business service, coal, chemical, consumer goods, entertainment, health care, real estate, retail, wholesale, and many more. Tap each stock to see FA indicator values, historical charts, scores, etc.
. Added Top Stocks of TA Scores by Industry ("Home" tab --> "Top Stocks of TA Score"). Scan and view the stocks with top technical analysis scores of various industries. You could tap each stock to see more details.
. Added "sort by score" feature when comparing FA Scores and TA Scores of multiple stocks.
. Improved Options Power.
. Improved News.
. Enabled using Face ID for app unlock. You could set it in "Me" tab --> "Settings".
. Improved the user interface of portfolio summary view and individual portfolio view.
. Now you can easily copy holding positions in one portfolio and duplicate them in another.

Recent Updates:
. Added "Options Flow Stream" in "Home" tab --> "Options Money Flow". You could view the latest buy and sell flow of options trades with details, filter large-sized trades at different levels, and identify how smart money moves.
. Added "FA History Chart" in "Research". View stocks' historical charts of many fundamental analysis indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc.

. Able to add additional purchase for options holding positions in a portfolio. (Tap the options position, choose "Add Additional Purchase" from the menu.)
. Fixed a rare instance where the keyboard covers part of the symbol auto completion search tip in "Research" tab.
. Enhanced app performance.

. Able to add additional purchase for options holding positions in a portfolio. (Tap the options position, choose "Add Additional Purchase" from the menu.)
. Fixed a rare instance where the keyboard covers part of the symbol auto completion search tip in "Research" tab.
. Enhanced app performance.
